about:
My name is Mihika Jain, and I am a Computer Science Major with a Business minor, and am incredibly passionate about software development and entrepreneurship. I want to use my skillset to be able to implement technology that pushes innovation and creates social impact. I am interested in both back end and full stack development

 I thrive in collaborative environments and find my greatest strengths in leadership, organization, and resilience. Outside of computer science, I am passionate about music, and sailing. I spent time at Cornell on the Varsity Sailing team and taking multiple music courses!
